name: Wrestling Evolution
description:
AN ADVENTURE BEHOLDS YOU

Hop on the most fascinating Wrestling game on the internet with great graphics and smooth frame rate. You can choose from a number of character and buy new characters to fight against intelligent NPC Wrestlers. 

BEST ATTACK MOVES

Create your own way of defending opponent with great controls. Defend yourself against opponent attack and attack at the right moment to lower opponent health.

GET YOUR OWN FAVORITE PLAYER

Choose from 8 different characters with there own attack techniques and different damage strength. Play in different arena and win the bet. 

OUTSTANDING WRESTLING ACTION

Outrageous attacks. Exaggerated poses. Unbelievable moves.
